tags.name: bayern-atlas
tags.description: A WebComponent that embeds the BayernAtlas in your page.

attributes.name: c
attributes.description: The Center coordinate (longitude,latitude / easting,northing) in map projection or in the configured SRID (see `ec_srid`). Example: `11,48`

attributes.name: z
attributes.description: The Zoom level (0-20) of the map. Example: `8`.

attributes.name: r
attributes.description: The rotation of the map (in rad). Example: `0.5`.

attributes.name: l
attributes.description: The layers of the map. Example: `layer_a,layer_b`.

properties.name: center
properties.description: Center coordinate in map projection or in the configured SRID

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: The rotation of the map (in rad)

events.name: ba-load
events.description: Fired when the BayernAtlas is loaded

events.name: ba-change
events.description: Fired when state of the BayernAtlas has changed

events.name: ba-feature-select
events.description: Fired when state of the BayernAtlas has changed

events.name: ba-geometry-change
events.description: Fired when state of the BayernAtlas has changed
